title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 836.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 836.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to facilities and provider agencies
certified, licensed, funded, or operated by the Office, and custodians thereof
in the following manner: (a) Facilities and provider agencies certified, licensed or operated by the Office
are subject to the jurisdiction of the Justice Center and shall follow
provisions consistent with Justice Center law and regulations; and
(b) Providers funded, but not certified or
licensed, by the Office are subject to the provisions of this Part solely
applicable to such providers as indicated herein. (c) To the extent that federal requirements
conflict with any of the provisions in this Part, the federal requirements
shall supersede the conflicting provisions in this Part with respect to any
such facility or provider agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14

836.3

Adopted

New

York State Register December 9, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 49, eff. 11/20/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
